Gustavo Rodrigues Galvão

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/7906213363972554
  • Última atualização do currículo em 08/09/2019

Possui graduação, mestrado e doutorado em Ciência da Computação pela Universidade Estadual de Campinas. Atualmente é engenheiro de software do Google. Tem experiência na área de Ciência da Computação, com ênfase em Biologia Computacional. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Produção bibliográfica
Artigos completos publicados em periódicos

1.
GALVÃO, G. R.2016GALVÃO, G. R.; BAUDET, C. ; DIAS, Z. . Sorting Circular Permutations by Super Short Reversals. IEEE-ACM Transactions on Computational Biology and Bioinformatics, v. 14, p. 620-633, 2016.

2.
GALVÃO, G. R.2015GALVÃO, G. R.; LEE, O. ; DIAS, Z. . Sorting signed permutations by short operations. Algorithms for Molecular Biology, v. 10, p. 12, 2015.

3.
DIAS, ULISSES2014DIAS, ULISSES ; GALVÃO, GUSTAVO RODRIGUES ; LINTZMAYER, CARLA NÉGRI ; DIAS, ZANONI . A general heuristic for genome rearrangement problems. Journal of Bioinformatics and Computational Biology (Print), v. 12, p. 1450012, 2014.

4.
GALVÃO, G. R.2014GALVÃO, G. R.; DIAS, Z. . An Audit Tool for Genome Rearrangement Algorithms. ACM Journal of Experimental Algorithmics, v. 19, p. 1.1-1.34, 2014.

5.
GALVÃO, G. R.2014GALVÃO, G. R.; DIAS, Z. . On Alternative Approaches for Approximating the Transposition Distance. Journal of Universal Computer Science (Print), v. 20, p. 1259-1283, 2014.

Trabalhos completos publicados em anais de congressos
1.
GALVÃO, G. R.; BAUDET, C. ; DIAS, Z. . Sorting Signed Circular Permutations by Super Short Reversals. In: 11th International Symposium on Bioinformatics Research and Applications (ISBRA'2015), 2015, Norfolk, VA. Lecture Notes in Bioinformatics. Berlin - Alemanha: Springer, 2015. v. 9096. p. 272-283.

2.
GALVÃO, GUSTAVO RODRIGUES; DIAS, ZANONI . Approximation algorithms for sorting by signed short reversals. In: the 5th ACM Conference, 2014, Newport Beach. Proceedings of the 5th ACM Conference on Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, and Health Informatics - BCB '14. New York: ACM Press. p. 360-369.

3.

Proceedings of the ISCA 4th International Conference on Bioinformatics and Computational Biology (BICoB'2012), 2012. p. 96-101.

4.
GALVÃO, G. R.; DIAS, Z. . On the Performance of Sorting Permutations by Prefix Operations. In: ISCA 4th International Conference on Bioinformatics and Computational Biology (BICoB'2012), 2012, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. Proceedings of the ISCA 4th International Conference on Bioinformatics and Computational Biology (BICoB'2012), 2012. p. 102-107.

5.
GALVÃO, G. R.; DIAS, Z. . On the Approximation Ratio of Algorithms for Sorting by Transpositions without Using Cycle Graphs. In: 7th Brazilian Symposium on Bioinformatics (BSB'2012), 2012, Campo Grande, MS, Brazil. Lecture Notes in Computer Science. Berlin - Alemanha: Springer-Verlag, 2012. v. 7409. p. 25-36.

6.
GALVÃO, G. R.; DIAS, Z. . A Flexible Framework for Computing Rearrangement Distance of Every Permutation in the Symmetric Group. In: 6th Brazilian Symposium on Bioinformatics (BSB'2011), 2011, Brasília, DF, Brazil. Proceedings of the 6th Brazilian Symposium on Bioinformatics (BSB'2011), 2011. p. 33-40.

7.
GALVÃO, G. R.; DIAS, Z. . On the Distribution of Rearrangement Distances. In: 6th Brazilian Symposium on Bioinformatics (BSB'2011), 2011, Brasília, DF, Brazil. Proceedings of the 6th Brazilian Symposium on Bioinformatics (BSB'2011), 2011. p. 41-48.
